name: OUYA Game - The Battle Of Foundation
blurb: A multiplayer fighting game in the style of Super Smash Brothers + Super Crate Box, for the OUYA system.

rewards.reward: -The Dollar Menu-\r\n\r\nOur undying gratitude and your name on the "Backers" page of our website!
-The Fiverrr-\r\nOur undying gratitude and your name on the "Backers" page of our website in a higher spot than the Dollar Menu people!
-The Ten Dolla' Holla- A cool unique background for your desktop (one of ?), plus all previous rewards.

-The Founder- The game is already free, but the customization options are not.  I'll give you a free customization pack (TBA), plus all the stuff before. AND a Founder Title/Achievement once that stuff gets worked into the game.  Plus access to the PC beta (may or may not be launched on PC, but will be tested on PC).

-The Founder With Five More Dollars- The game is already free, but the customization options are not.  I'll give you all of the launching customization packs (TBA), plus all the stuff before.  I'm shooting for 5 customization packs at launch, which will probably be a couple dollars a piece. And you get the earlier rewards.

-The Customization and/or Level Designer- Not only do you get everything mentioned before, but I'll also actually contact you to hear your ideas for future customization options! Plus, if any of your ideas are used (which many will be) you'll get it for free (since it's your idea).  You can also send me your level ideas! And you get the earlier rewards.

-The Doppleganger- I'll send you an image that you can color in and send back to design your own head that will be in game upon launch.  It must be PG and you must own the idea (no reproductive organs or copies of already existing things like Star Wars or StarCraft or anything else). It'll also be named whatever you want. And you get the earlier rewards.

-The Business Person-\r\nYour name or business name/logo will appear in game (on a billboard or something, we'll work that out later) in one of the addon levels, and it will be worked into the universe as an existing company. Plus you get everything mentioned before.

-The Business-\r\nYour name or business name/logo will appear in game (on a billboard or something, we'll work that out later) ON LAUNCH day, and it will be worked into the universe as an existing company. You also get all the other rewards mentioned other than The Business Person.

-The Musician- With this donation, you get to make the music for the game!  Not only do you get to make the music, but you can then sell it (as a soundtrack) and keep all of the profits (so with your donation, you're technically keeping the rights to the music instead of handing them over to me).  You'll also be on the main menu as "Music By: (your name here)" and there will be a link to your website(s).  Plus I'll promote your soundtrack to help boost your sales. THERE ARE RULES TO THIS such as: music must be HIGH quality, must fit the theme of the game (ie country music, doesn't fit the game, nor does other genres), and I reserve the right to turn down any songs.  However I will be working close with you and I am pretty relaxed on the music as long as I feel it fits the game. Also, you're working on a deadline because I need the music by beta. You also get all the other rewards mentioned other than The Business, and The Business Person.

-The Advertiser- Similar to The Business level, except your company will be worked into the actual story somehow, and your billboards will be in on the loading screens. You also get all the other rewards mentioned other than The Musician, The Business, and The Business Person.

-The Angel- You are an angel to us and we will put you and one other person of your choosing up in a decent hotel and take you out to dinner and you can party with us at the launch party. You have to get your own transportation to South Florida. Must be 21 years of age. Seriously if you're under 21 how did you get $10,000 anyway? You also get all the other rewards mentioned other than The Musician, The Business, and The Business Person.
